So got introduced to the app like late January through the referral program, so in the month of Feb I was grinding quite a bit and I had loads of referrals. March I didn’t do nothing but yesterday I was bored and had nothing to do so I tried to make some bank by getting a new referral but the process didn’t work like usual. Now I’m super confused did the referral program end or is this just a bug on my end?

I sent money through the app but the attempt failed and the amount was withdrawn from my wallet without the transaction being completed. I tried to contact them to retrieve the money so I could send it again. I was shocked that I would not be able to retrieve the amount until a week after the transfer date. I am very angry because the situation is urgent and I was in dire need to send the money.
Worst service in the world don’t use it for transfer money still my money is delayed to transfer. I just send it 3 days before still it’s not credited in the account.

A week ago,I transferred an amount of 5000 dirhams to my other account using the Payit app and got a message telling me that the transaction was failed, I called them and explained to them my problem and they informed me that they are currently working to solve this issue on my account, a few days later I sent them an email as well and no one is responding back to me, even after sending 3 reminders to them, unfortunately I have no choice but to go to one of their branch’s and fight them about my missing money

i hate this app so much i will not be using it again. The app is always failing and lags. I was transferring an amount to my own bank account and it failed. Its been 5 days and customer service is not responding and the money has not been sent.

title.label: disappointed with the lack of communication and support provided by your team.

content.label:
I hope you are doing well. I deposited a cheque into my Payit account on January 27, and today, February 3, I discovered that the cheque was not accepted into my account. Since then, I have been calling and sending emails, but I have not received any proper updates or a clear status on the situation.

I was informed that the cheque was returned to the UAQ Branch , but after that, I have not received any further updates, either through calls or emails. I am feeling very disappointed with the lack of communication and support provided by your team.

Could you kindly assist me in understanding how I can retrieve my cheque as I urgently need it? Please provide a clear solution and timeframe.
Awesome

title.label: “Unable to Pay School Fees via Credit Card”

content.label: I was informed by my kids’ school that we could make school fee payments via credit card through this app, but it’s been an absolute waste of time. I’ve emailed multiple times to the support email and called the help center. Today, I was finally told by a call center agent that credit cards cannot be added. Had they told me this from the start, I wouldn’t have wasted so much time following up with customer service.
